title: Flip Flappers
synopsis: Cocona is an average middle schooler living with her grandmother. And she who has yet to decide a goal to strive for, soon met a strange girl named Papika who invites her to an organization called Flip Flap.
voices: ['Ichimichi, Mao', 'Takahashi, Minami', 'Ohashi, Ayaka', 'Murase, Michiyo', 'Toshinou, Airi', 'Fukushima, Jun', 'Okitsu, Kazuyuki', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Kayano, Ai']
